thread.title: Leis Appoints Michael Konnert to its Board of Directors

author: cnbc.com
title: Leis Appoints Michael Konnert to its Board of Directors
text:
ST. ALBERT, Alberta, April 06, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Leis Industries Limited (“ Leis ” or “ The Corporation ”) (NEX:LES.H) is pleased to announce the appointment of Mr. Michael Konnert to the Board of Directors, effective April 6, 2018. Mr. Konnert is an independent businessman based in Vancouver, BC. He has been a director of several publicly traded companies on the TSX-V and ASX.
The Corporation also wishes to announce the resignation of two directors, Matthew Potter and Jim Stout, effective April 6, 2018. The Corporation would like to thank both Mr. Potter and Mr. Stout for their contribution to the Corporation, and wish them both well with their future endeavours.
Neither TSX Venture Exchange nor its Regulation Services Provider (as that term is defined in the policies of the TSX Venture Exchange) accepts responsibility for the adequacy or accuracy of this release .
Leonard Jaroszuk
President and Chief Executive Officer
+1 (780) 418 4069
Jaroszuk@gmail.com
Source: Leis Industries Limited
